Class PubSub

  • java.lang.Object
    • PubSub

  • public class PubSub
extends java.lang.Object
    Acts as an event handler for Subscribing, Unsubscribing and Publishing of events and time events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Event> events
      List of events.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<TimeEvent> timeEvents
      List of time events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PubSub() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEventAt(int index, Event event)
      Adds a event to a particular index position.
      void addTimeEventAt(int index, TimeEvent event)
      Adds a time event to a particular index position.
      void emit(java.lang.String name)
      Publishes(or Emits) an event that has already been subscribed.
      void emitTime(java.lang.String name)
      Publishes(or Emits) a time event if already Subscribed.
      void off(java.lang.String name)
      Unsubscribes(or UnBinds) an event that has already been subscribed
      void offTime(java.lang.String name)
      Unsubscribes(or UnBinds) to a time event if already Subscribed.
      void on(java.lang.String eventname, Callback cb)
      Creates and Subscribes(or Binds) to an event.
      void onTime(long time, java.lang.String name, Callback cb)
      Creates and Subscribes(or Binds) to a time event that will be published after `time`ms.

                  TimeEvent event)
        Adds a time event to a particular index position.

        event - The time event.

      • on

        public void on(java.lang.String eventname,
      Callback cb)
        Creates and Subscribes(or Binds) to an event.
        Parameters:
        eventname - The name of the event to subscribe to.
        cb - Callback that is executed when the event occurs.

      • emit

        public void emit(java.lang.String name)
        Publishes(or Emits) an event that has already been subscribed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the event to publish.

      • off

        public void off(java.lang.String name)
        Unsubscribes(or UnBinds) an event that has already been subscribed
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the event to unsubscribe.

      • onTime

        public void onTime(long time,
          java.lang.String name,
          Callback cb)
        Creates and Subscribes(or Binds) to a time event that will be published after `time`ms.
        Parameters:
        time - The time delay before the event is published.
        name - The name of the event to subscribe to.
        cb - Callback that is executed when the event occurs.

      • emitTime

        public void emitTime(java.lang.String name)
        Publishes(or Emits) a time event if already Subscribed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the event to publish.

      • offTime

        public void offTime(java.lang.String name)
        Unsubscribes(or UnBinds) to a time event if already Subscribed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the event to unsubscribe.
